episodes.title: Critical Cult News - The Israeli/Palestinian Conflict
episodes.description:
Tonight we are doing a deep dive into the causes and events of the Israeli/Palestinian conflict with a look at the religious, nationalistic and extreme/cultic motivations behind all of it. This is not a topic for the faint of heart and we understand it's a highly charged and controversial one. Join us at 6pm MT/8pm ET Thursday night live.

episodes.title: Critical Cult News - Kenyan Starvation Cult, Enforced Religion at Work, Sullivanian Cult
episodes.description:
Tonight we premiere our first Critical Cult News show - a weekly live show premiering for members only, covering 3-5 news stories per week dealing with cults and coercive control. Tonight, we cover the Kenyan cult leader Paul Mackenzie, a North Carolina business in trouble for forcing employees to pray and a New York cult hiding in plain sight.

This being our first episode and the graphic layout leaving a lot to be desired, I am going to apologize for that and let you know next week's show will visually be a lot clearer.

A full transcript of the news portion of this show is available on my website at https://mncriticalthinking.com

Sources:
=========
Kenya Cult Leader Paul Mackenzie

https://nation.africa/kenya/counties/kilifi/unmasking-paul-nthenge-the-preacher-linked-to-children-s-death--4171918

https://www.bbc.com/news/world-africa-65412822
